name: Sylfrain Johnson
bio: Johnson is from Delma33. He loves to learn, and is very curious about the world and how it works. Growing up, Johnson always had dreams of becoming an engineer. He loves drawing, listening to music, playing video games. When he is not at the iLab, he is teaching kids ages 8-14 years. He enjoys working with kids. Johnson thinks that iLab // Haiti is a way for people to progress with technology and have more and more ideas about what they want to do. For himself, he is excited about the opportunity to develop technical skills that will help him reach his goal of becoming an engineer.
